review: nice

i played and beat this when it originally came out in 2000 was super happy to see this on steam because i had lost my disc so many years ago and wanted to play this again absolute classic and so much nostalgia the story and characters are hilarious though i do find the mdk suit to be laughably weirdlooking lmao just a great thirdperson game honestly cant go wrong with it especially with the great price tag attached to it

murderdeathkill or maxdockurt as they refer to it  a blast from the past and one of the best games by bioware apart from mass effect and kotor sadly there wont be mdk 3 or another quirky thing like this ps jesper kyd is a beast
a classic ill remember bioware by as the characters themselves would put it kurt yes its all over dr hawkins yeah im glad its over max rrrruff

this game aged like milk there is no reason to play this other than nostalgia  enemies and puzzles are annoying rather than challenging humour is corny and level design is nonsensical  kids in roblox couldve make a better game i only remembered this because of the 4 armed dog
great game
i like this one mostly for tha environment art
despite the occasional tedium this is a very remarkable game

the first mdk was much better because it was spectacular in gameplay and graphicseffects  amazing sniper zoom cool environments with the mirrors and tfighterish ships the absurd humor the board surfing air gliding take a lift from a bomber camouflage as a robot and so on  this game is also very nice but its not that spectaculair anymore but nice enough to play this days
its ok

wanted to give this a thumbs up for schwang schwing alone but unfortunately i did reach a point where i just got too frustrated to care the maze level and stopped playing its too bad because playing as the three different protagonists is fun and i love the games quirky comic book style theres some creative and funny moments especially during dr hawkins chapters i might return to this someday but in the meantime i have to be honest and rank it a thumbs down

as fun as i remembered  very interesting design  three different play styles in one game  well paced  the graphics were good for y2k especially considering the excellent frame rate  good va level design sound pretty much everything remappable keys i hope biowares publisher allows them to build good games again games as fun not games as a ervice
